channel.title: Posts on ausectj
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on ausectj

item.title: Why I Made This Website
item.description: I haven’t always wanted my own website. In fact, I was long convinced that creating my own website would be a waste of time and effort. This article documents the reasons why I took the jump.

item.title: Starting My Career in College
item.description: My first exploration into web development was through an unpaid virtual internship that I took on for a small laundromat in LA after high school. The laundromat was run by a single guy with dreams of a low-maintanence, passive income stream in the form of this laundromat. He had a few employees, but was generally hell-bent on reducing costs and raising income with as little effort as possible. The point of the internship was to bring in cheap labor to help market the business and increase revenues.
